author: Mark
content: Bullish: MSFT is undervalued. Great time to start a position if you haven't already.

author: John
content: When this sleeping giant wakes up it’s going to soar 💰💰💰

author: Gold is the new TINA
content: Devastating news for Microsoft Investors: This will greatly delay microsofts Ai plans. New Nvidia AI chips overheating in servers, the Information reports

author: Your retirement is shrinking
content: Microsoft has lost 6% cloud market share ytd. May get worse

author: Kaching
content: Bullish: No idea how Microsoft is down. It should be nearing $800 now

author: None
content: Up only 10% ytd and puny dividend. Not bad but not great.

author: Nicholas
content: Bullish: Nice pullback but need more. MSFT is overpriced and needs to be at $385

author: Lindy
content: Bullish: $MSFT Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella is scheduled to deliver a significant announcement during the Microsoft Ignite conference on Tuesday, November 19, 2024. Following this, CNBC will air an exclusive interview with Mr. Nadella at 11:00am.
